subject: Automobile Racing
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: The six-race suspension of the crew chief Chad Knaus, who helped the driver Jimmie Johnson win five Nascar championships, was overturned by Nascar’s chief appeals officer.
snippet: The six-race suspension of the crew chief Chad Knaus, who helped the driver Jimmie Johnson win five Nascar championships, was overturned by Nascar’s chief appeals officer.
